tag_list: jaw-plate, jaw-crusher, stone-crusher, crusher-bowl-liner, high-chrome-blow-bars, heat-resistant-mandrels, regular-products, industrial-alloys--casting
overview:
With our 11 years of industrial experience, we are able to offer quality range of Steel and Alloy Steel Castings, Weight up to 3500 Kg. These are manufactured by using quality tested material to ensure longer service life. Further, we are also backed by all the requisite facilities, which is essential for manufacturing of Steel and Alloy Steel Castings. Our Castings are widely used in Crushing, Mining and Cement Industries in India and abroad.

Further, we carry out every process related to the manufacturing of Steel and Alloy Steel Castings in a systematic manner. Our complete product range undergoes various tests such as:

  1. Chemical Test (By Spectrometer).

  2. Physical Properties Test i.e. Tensile testing, hardness testing and impact testing.

  3. NDT

    Ultrasonic Testing Micro Structure analysis and radiography. D.P. Test.

  4. As per customer requirement third party inspection will be done.
